statements.query: MATCH (n:APIGatewayClientCertificate)<-[:HAS_CERTIFICATE]-(:APIGatewayStage)<-[:ASSOCIATED_WITH]-(:APIGatewayRestAPI)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)

MATCH (:APIGatewayClientCertificate)<-[r:HAS_CERTIFICATE]-(:APIGatewayStage)<-[:ASSOCIATED_WITH]-(:APIGatewayRestAPI)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)
MATCH (n:APIGatewayStage)<-[:ASSOCIATED_WITH]-(:APIGatewayRestAPI)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
MATCH (:APIGatewayStage)<-[r:ASSOCIATED_WITH]-(:APIGatewayRestAPI)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)
MATCH (n:APIGatewayResource)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:APIGatewayRestAPI)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
MATCH (:APIGatewayResource)<-[r:RESOURCE]-(:APIGatewayRestAPI)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)
MATCH (n:APIGatewayRestAPI)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
MATCH (:APIGatewayRestAPI)<-[r:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)
